Label: ID
Comment: Primary Key. Unique Identifier of the patient.

Label: Birth Date
Comment: The date the patient was born.

Label: Death Date
Comment: The date the patient died.

Label: Social Security Number
Comment: Patient Social Security identifier.

Label: Driver's License Number
Comment: Patient Drivers License identifier.

Label: Passport Number
Comment: Patient Passport identifier.

Label: Prefix
Comment: Name prefix, such as Mr., Mrs., Dr., etc.

Label: First Name
Comment: First name of the patient.

Label: Last Name
Comment: Last or surname of the patient.

Label: Suffix
Comment: Name suffix, such as PhD, MD, JD, etc.

Label: Maiden Name
Comment: Maiden name of the patient.

Label: Marital Status
Comment: Marital Status. M is married, S is single. Currently no support for divorce (D) or widowing (W)

Label: Race
Comment: Description of the patient's primary race.

Label: Ethnicity
Comment: Description of the patient's primary ethnicity.

Label: Gender
Comment: Gender. M is male, F is female.

Label: Birth Place
Comment: Name of the town where the patient was born.

Label: Address
Comment: Patient's street address without commas or newlines.

Label: City
Comment: Patient's address city.

Label: State
Comment: Patient's address state.

Label: Zip Code
Comment: Patient's zip code.
